channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Lots of rubbish and litter 9-11 London lane, 31st July
item.description:
Rubbish has been dumped here for so long, it hasn’t been taken by the council yet and has been reported numerous times

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): London Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two dead saplings - Hoblingwell Wood Recreation Ground, 31st July
item.description:
Two of the three saplings planted just over a year ago west of the playground at Hoblingwell Wood Recreation Ground, seem to have died. Please could these be inspected and any necessary remedial action be taken?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leesons Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Untaxed Van, 31st July
item.description:
Being used by residents from No1, parked illegally and untaxed. Currently parked outside No1 Oakmere Road. There are other vehicles reported untaxed, which are being used by the same residents but nothing being done

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakmere Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damaged tree - Hoblingwell, 31st July
item.description:
A tree has been damaged. This is located behind the memorial bench west of the playground at Hoblingwell Wood Recreation Ground. Please could this be inspected and any necessary remedial action taken?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leesons Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox under bushes on corner of Lee Road and Priory Park, 31st July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 57, Priory Park, Kidbrooke, London
